channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General’s Office and Isanti County Attorney’s Office secure another guilty plea for December 2023 burglary turned homicide
item.description:
Publication Date: June 03, 2025

Gerald (a/k/a “Jerold”) Allen Downs pled guilty to aiding and abetting 2nd degree murder

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/06/03_Downs.asp
